name: UX LivingLab
description: In-house browser extension to manage users' UX LivingLab Account, increase overall productivity, and improve user exprience. It includes options such as realtime notification of new company products, easy login/logout for developers and other staff members, chat, logs, and profile setting. There are no seecurity risks. Please refer to the screenshot directory for sample pictures.
author: Adeleke Omotayo Jude
